sentence.Network_en: I would creep in and with stealthy footsteps explore the second-floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 我会偷偷溜进去，轻手轻脚地查看一下二楼。

sentence.Network_en: I managed to get there by a series of stealthy movements.
sentence.Network_cn: 我通过一连串悄无声息的动作设法到达了那里.

sentence.Network_en: The scout made a stealthy approach to the enemy position.
sentence.Network_cn: 侦察兵偷偷地靠近敌军阵地.

entry.tran: 悄悄的;偷偷摸摸的;鬼鬼祟祟的
entry.def: Stealthy actions or movements are performed quietly and carefully, so that no one will notice what you are doing.

example.ex: I would creep in and with stealthy footsteps explore the second-floor...
example.tran: 我会偷偷溜进去，轻手轻脚地查看一下二楼。

example.ex: It was a stealthy sound made by someone anxious not to be heard.
example.tran: 这是有人不想让别人听到而偷偷摸摸移动的声音。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by quiet and caution and secrecy; taking pains to avoid being observed;

auth_sentence.content: The enemy is stealthy, almost invisible and quite ruthless.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The enemy is stealthy, almost invisible and quite ruthless.

auth_sentence.content: Women are patient, stealthy and methodical.

sentences.en: He crept stealthily along the corridor.
sentences.cn: 他沿着走廊蹑手蹑脚地走。

sentences.en: Stealthily we approached the enemy’s camp.
sentences.cn: 我们偷偷地摸向敌人的营地。

sentences.en: The thief stealthily stole into the house.
sentences.cn: 那个贼悄悄地潜入房子。

sentences.en: I managed to get there by a series of stealthy movements.
sentences.cn: 我通过一连串悄无声息的动作设法到达了那里。
